about_the_game:
WELCOME TO THE JUICY WORLD OF THE FRUIT GIRLS!



This is the perfect game for those who want to enjoy the famous and juicy Fruit Girls while playing with just one hand. Complete puzzles by choosing your challenge level and indulge yourself in the most delicious photo shoots you've ever seen. Meet Amphira, our Sweet Strawberry, in this demo version to know what awaits you in the Hentai Jigsaw Photo Studio: Fruit Girls full game.

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains adult themes and content that may not be suitable for all ages. These themes include nudity and sex.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 10, Windows 8, Windows 7 64-bit
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD processor, 2 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1 GB
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 10, Windows 8, Windows 7 64-bit
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD processor, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Graphics: 2 GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
